forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 79, with temperatures falling to around 74 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. Southwest wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the morning unfolds under a generous expanse of blue sky, dotted with the softest of clouds. A pleasant warmth begins to settle over the city, hinting at a high near 79, though cooler breezes whisper of a gentle transition into the mid-afternoon. The world appears fresh, shimmering with a clarity that invites exploration, while the famed San Francisco fog lingers timidly at the edges of your perspective, not intruding but framing the iconic Golden Gate Bridge in a light mist, as if to offer a delicate contrast to the sun-soaked streets below.

As daylight lingers and temperatures fall to around 74, the evening air will cradle you in coolness, with a nighttime low of 54 providing just enough chill to warrant a light jacket or sweater before heading out. Ideal for a stroll through bustling neighborhoods or perhaps a leisurely visit to one of the many local cafes, the day beckons you to enjoy the serene beauty of the waterfront or the vibrant artistry of the Mission District. This day presents an opportunity to savor the simple pleasures—perhaps a warm drink in hand while soaking in the vivid tapestry of city life, where whispers of the coast weave seamlessly into urban rhythms.
